Name: Berserk
Description: Desolation, destruction, elimination and eradication! Stop at nothing until your enemy is no more. Highly increase offence and speed, but reduce defence.

Name: Blacked Out
Description: Blacked out from consciousness and combat. A dangerous respite.

Name: Bleeding
Description: A bleeding wound is often not much emergency issue in the face of life and death in battle. Such a wound still takes its toll in long term, though.

Name: Blind
Description: Blindness is pretty much the equivalent of certain death in battle. Unable to fight effectively, such disability must be treated as soon as possible.

Name: Burn
Description: Dead by burning is not a good way to go. Try to drench yourselves as soon as possible.

Name: Charge
Description: Charging with speed into enemies. Only Gods may decide the fate of the encounter.

Name: Clarity
Description: Clarity of the mind. No manipulation will thwart a warrior from their fight.

Name: Cold
Description: Cold and shivering. Become slightly less effective in combat and vulnerable to water damage. Find some place warm or light up the fire.

Name: Confuse
Description: "What is going on? What is happening?" Confusion in battle may last a short time, but such a condition may as well cause defeat.

Name: Cripple
Description: Cripple in body, but can the heart hold out? Only time will tell.

Name: Cure
Description: Cure from negative physical manifestations. A healthy warrior for a hearty combat.

Name: Deadly Poison
Description: A deadly poison that cannot be cured. Very few can survive this painful experience, and even fewer can live a long life after.

Name: Defence Boost
Description: Improved in defence. Allowing to block incoming hits with better ease.

Name: Disarmed
Description: Losing a weapon is a shame that any warrior worth their salt should reconsider their life. But now is a good time to run.

Name: Disrupt
Description: Disruption must be quelled before chaos breaks out.

Name: Distract
Description: Distracted from battle. Not even the best shield will help when its wielder does not focus on the enemies.

Name: Drench
Description: Wet from head to toes, almost as if swimming in the water. Avoid cold temperature or air element damage at all costs.

Name: Drunk
Description: Getting drunk in battle may not be the smartest thing to do, but It sure helps raise the morale and fierceness of the unit.

Name: Earth Shield
Description: Blessing of the earth, to be its guardian forevermore.

Name: Enraged
Description: Enraged enough to attack with intensity, but not enough to forget to defend.

Name: Escalation Phase 1
Description: Escalation begins, weakness prevails, yet strength awaits.

Name: Escalation Phase 2
Description: Escalation progresses, weakness retreats, strength approaches.

Name: Escalation Phase 3
Description: Escalation climax, weakness ends, strength permeates.

Name: Excited
Description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the face of death.

Name: False Advance
Description: The advance order dictates that one must advance into the enemy's blade.

Name: False Idle
Description: Stay still and await another order.

Name: False Retreat
Description: You are permitted to return home. Go now, while we secure your retreat.

Name: Fear
Description: There should be no fear in the machine of war. Fear makes even obedient soldiers refuse to follow the command after all.

Name: Freezing
Description: Frozen in place and time. Nothing to be done but wait.

Name: Haste
Description: Overflowed with speed. So reached half a victory.

Name: Hope
Description: Optimism to survive and see the better days is good. A soldier always fights harder when there is hope.

Name: Hot
Description: Hot, is it not? Be careful of heatstroke.

Name: Oiled
Description: Oiled up and ready to be cooked. This unit will catch fire much faster.

Name: Panic
Description: "Forward! I said forward you fool! Listen to my command!"

Name: Pin Down
Description: Pinned down in place and unable to move quickly. A primed target for a hail of arrows.

Name: Plague
Description: Anyone with a plague is dangerous to everyone around him, especially when so many people are staying so close in tight formation.

Name: Poison
Description: A dangerous substance that causes damage over time. Endure and hope for the best or seek aid.

Name: Second Wind
Description: Regaining lost health to enjoy the fight a little longer.

Name: Slow
Description: Slowing to a crawl. Best be steady, or you may lose both race and war.

Name: Stun
Description: Vision blur, hearing deafen, regain oneself or be perished.

Name: Wet
Description: Being wet can be either good or bad. Fire and burning become much less effective, but the damage and effect of air and water become a dangerous threat.
